abstract: Mikhail Prokhorov, the Russian mining and metals billionaire, came in a distant third to Vladimir Putin in the presidential elections last Sunday, and he has already started forming a new party. It seems clear that his older sister, the literary publisher Irina Prokhorova, will play a major role in his electoral aspirations - while perhaps pursuing a political future of her own.

headline.main: A Political Future for the Billionaire's Sister?
